EmailTemplate.description: Email to redirect Provider to BCBS TX Portal
EmailTemplate.name: BCBS Texas Ancillary Contracting Shared Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Email Closed: See notice regarding new submission : (Case Number - {!Case.CaseNumber})
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for contacting Blue Cross and Blue Shield of Texas.
This email is confirmation we have received your inquiry, Case number is {!Case.CaseNumber} and will be processed as a onetime courtesy; as this email box is no longer monitored. To avoid delays on your future requests, please visit our website at https://www.bcbstx.com/provider/contact_us.html and locate the current Ancillary Network Management Consultant's contact information for your specialty.
We will respond to your inquiry in the order it was received. To check the status of your case, please click on status checker ({!$Setup.UtilitySettings_Hierarchy__c.CaseStatusUrl__c}).
Sincerely, Blue Cross and Blue Shield of Texas
Powered by: SalesforceTM
Blue Cross and Blue Shield of Texas, a Division of Health Care Service Corporation, a Mutual Legal Reserve Company, an Independent Licensee of the Blue Cross and Blue Shield Association.
Â© 2017 Health Care Service Corporation. All rights reserved.
(NOTE: Please do not remove the Ref id) Ref id {!Case.Thread_Id}
